headline: As U.S. Drilling Cools, Oilfield Service Firms Chase Middle East Demand
summary: With U.S. activity slowing, major oilfield service firms including SLB, Halliburton, Weatherford, Helmerich & Payne, and Patterson-UTI Energy are pivoting toward the Middle East for growth
